replies.body:
He is an armordillo, ok?

Ok.
@ Riot KateyKhaos, according to [this](http://www.twinfinite.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/King-Rammus.png), he IS a turtle. ;-)

Pshh, Shen has TWO skins comparing him to Mortal Kombat characters, but he can neither freeze people nor hook people.
He's not even any more of a ninja than Rammus...
Clearly you're forgetting Shen taunts enemies, which is nearly enough of a "Get over here" mechanic. Also: {{item:3116}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3110}}
